%%% The main file. It includes all other parts.

\input{settings/settings}

%
%--------------------------Beginning of the document--------------------------
%

\begin{document}

\def\figurename{Figure}
\def\tablename{Table}

\include{title/title}


%%% A page with automatically generated table of contents of the doctoral thesis
\microtypesetup{protrusion=false}
\tableofcontents
\microtypesetup{protrusion=true}

%%% Each chapter is kept in a separate file
\include{preface/preface}
\include{introduction/introduction}
\include{objectives/objectives}
\include{results_and_discussion/results_and_discussion}
\include{conclusions/conclusions}

%%% Bibliography and various indices
\include{misc/misc}

\end{document}
